messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Nothing Bad Happens on this Station Ever.'s powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Nothing Bad Happens on this Station Ever., please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: La station est baisée, nous partons, tous les traîtres sont probablement morts.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: "La station est baisee, nous partons, tous les traitres sont problement morts.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Nothing Bad Happens on this Station Ever., please stand-by.
